title: John Varvatos Men's Slim Fit Winter Garment Dyed Denim
description: Our Slim Fit jeans exemplify innovative design and refined technique. Crafted from stretch denim, this garment undergoes a unique dyeing process to achieve a dynamic high-low effect. The dark seams contrast with the wheat hued canvas, highlighting a distinctive balance between traditional craftsmanship and contemporary flair. Pair them with your go-to leather boots and our latest shirt jacket for a sharp look.
